name: Cute Family Chest
description: An exclusive gift for the cute family, which contains many interesting stuffs.

name: Cute Pet Appreciation
description: Pet Association publish this gift to specially thanks to all the adventurers. Open up will receive a Random pet. (Event pets are not include)

name: Cute Reindeer Horn
description: Longhorn, big eyes, red nose, fluffy face, the cute little reindeer is the best reindeer of Santa Claus

name: Cute Reindeer Horn Blueprint
description: Longhorn, big eyes, red nose, fluffy face, the cute little reindeer is the best reindeer of Santa Claus

name: Cute Ribbon
description: Band used to fix hair with an eye-catching small butterfly knot.

description: Band used to fix hair with an eye-catching small butterfly knot.

name: Cute Ribbon [1]
description: Band used to fix hair with an eye-catching small butterfly knot.

name: Cutlus [1]
description: A sword often used by the crew.
effect: Str ＋1,When caster learned [Bowling Bash] Lv.10, Damage of [Bowling Bash] increases by 30%

description: A sword often used by the crew
effect: Str ＋1,When caster learned [Bowling Bash] Lv.10, Damage of [Bowling Bash] increases by 30%

name: Cutter
description: Knives specially made for cutting things.

description: Knives specially made for cutting things.

name: Cyanogen Windmill
description: It's a windmill, but when the wind blows it will not rotate.

name: Cyanogen Windmill Blueprint
description: It's a windmill, but when the wind blows it will not rotate.

name: Cyber Shooter
description: The product of Rekenber Corporation's latest technology and highly sought after by every shooter, this futuristic bow is outfitted with night vision aiming tech as well as wind and gravity correction system.

name: Cyfar
description: Rare mineral that emits a blue light. I wonder what you can make with it?

name: Dagger
description: Knives whose blade is properly bended.

name: Dagger [2]
description: Knives whose blade is properly bended.

name: Dark Cuisine Pack
description: Dark Cuisine Pack is the equipment that every dark cuisine cook dreams of. The Dark Pan made from Nibelungen by a blacksmith combines the arcana of alchemists with the poison of assassins in which the knife named "Tail" and a flag representing Dark Cuisine are inserted. [Author: CrazyRyo]

name: Dark Dancing Mask
description: Mask worn by the nobility in the dark ages.
